scripts.build:micromamba: touch ~/.bashrc && curl -Ls https://micromamba.snakepit.net/api/micromamba/linux-64/latest | tar -xvj bin/micromamba && ./bin/micromamba shell init -s bash -p ~/micromamba
scripts.build:pygmt: source ~/.bashrc && micromamba create --file environment.yml --yes && micromamba activate pygmt && make install
scripts.build:docs: source ~/.bashrc && micromamba activate pygmt && cd doc && make all && mv _build/html ../public
scripts.build: npm run build:micromamba && npm run build:pygmt && npm run build:docs
